itemListElement.name: Wasabi Soba chilled with grilled veggies

@graph.name: Wasbai Soba Chilled with Grilled Veggies
@graph.description: Wasabi Soba Chilled Noodles With Grilled Veggies. A simple, delicious and healthy dinner ready in under half an hour. Vegan Gluten Free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 2 cups buckwheat soba ((cooked acc to instructions and chilled with ice cubes))
Assorted veggies grilled in oil on high flame ((carrots, bell pepper, red pepper, onion, ginger))
cilantro ((grated ginger or other herbs for garnish))
1 teaspoon wasabi ( (we got some fresh from asian store))

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the soba noodles and chill.
recipeInstructions.name: Prepare the soba noodles and chill.

recipeInstructions.text: Grill some veggies and add them to the chilled noodles.
recipeInstructions.name: Grill some veggies and add them to the chilled noodles.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix in all the dressing ingredients and half teaspoon wasabi well and keep ready.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix in all the dressing ingredients and half teaspoon wasabi well and keep ready.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve chilled noodles with dressing on the side and half teaspoon wasabi on top the noodles!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve chilled noodles with dressing on the side and half teaspoon wasabi on top the noodles!

@graph.keywords: healthy dinner, noodle dish, quick meal
